msContents.summary: Commentary on a treatise on arithmetic written by Ibn al-Hāʼim Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad.

title: Sharḥ ʻalá Nuzʹhat al-nuẓẓār fī ʻilm al-ghubār.

title.#text: شرح على نزهة النظار في علم الغبار

msItem.title: Sharḥ ʻalá Nuzʹhat al-nuẓẓār fī ʻilm al-ghubār.

supportDesc.extent: 50 leaves : 230 x 160 (175 x 110) mm, bound to 235 x 170 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in naskh in black ink; pointed, unvocalized.

decoNote: Rubrications in red, including source-text. Tables and calculations.

binding.p: Quarter covers. Pink and black marbled sides over pasteboard with cracked, brown leather spine. Light purple and black marbled pastedowns.

origin.p: Item is not dated. Likely copied in the 18th or 19th century.

provenance: Formerly owned by George A. Plimpton (bookplate on inside back cover).
